abstract: Mr. Eatroff is leaving to become the cable giant’s executive vice president for global corporate development and strategy.
snippet: Mr. Eatroff is leaving to become the cable giant’s executive vice president for global corporate development and strategy.
lead_paragraph: A senior Morgan Stanley deal maker is leaving the firm to join a longtime client, Comcast, as a senior executive in charge of corporate development.

headline.main: Robert Eatroff, a Top Morgan Stanley Deal Maker, Is Joining Comcast

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
